vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.37
§ Rezin = "firm"
1) king of Damascus during the reigns of kings Jotham and Ahaz of Judah
2) the progenitor of a family of temple slaves who returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   rey de Siria; (b)   jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利汛 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 「穩固」
1) 大馬色王，時值猶大王約坦和亞哈斯年間 ( 賽 7:1,8)
2) 與所羅巴伯從被擄之地回歸的殿役, 其中一個家族的祖先名
( 拉 2:48; 尼 7:50)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利汛 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 「稳固」
1) 大马色王，时值犹大王约坦和亚哈斯年间 ( 赛 7:1,8)
2) 与所罗巴伯从被掳之地回归的殿役, 其中一个家族的祖先名
( 拉 2:48; 尼 7:50)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.48
§ Rezin = "firm"
1) king of Damascus during the reigns of kings Jotham and Ahaz of Judah
2) the progenitor of a family of temple slaves who returned from captivity with Zerubbabel
